desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

profile.en:
A friendly, outgoing member of the Trinity Make-Up Work Club.

Hifumi's just a regular girl with average grades, but she's nonetheless well liked and popular for her well-rounded personality. She's a good listener for anyone who needs to vent about their worries or problems, but this also causes her to get swept up in the moment and unintentionally cause trouble.
profile.jp:
トリニティ総合学園所属、補習授業部の多情多感な少女。

外見も成績も普通だが、穏やかで優しい性格なため周囲から人気がある。周りの人々の悩みや話をよく聞いてくれるものの、そのせいで雰囲気に流されてしまい、意図せずトラブルを起こしてしまうこともある。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
三一综合学园所属，「补课部」多情善感的少女。

外貌和成绩都很普通，但因为和气而温柔的性格而受到大家的欢迎。
会认真倾听周围人们的烦恼和聊天，但也因此有时会被这样的气氛牵着鼻子走，在不经意间惹出麻烦。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
三一综合学园所属，补课部的感情丰富的少女。

虽然外貌和成绩都不出众，但稳重且温柔的性格很受人欢迎。
时常倾听身边人们的烦恼及心事，但有时也会因而在无意中惹出麻烦。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
崔尼蒂补习部成员，是个感情细腻的少女。

她的长相和成绩都不算出众，但因其性格温柔，所以人气很高。
虽然她很愿意倾听周围的人诉说烦恼和故事，但也会无意间受到氛围影响而惹出麻烦。

gacha.en: If Sensei's going to be with me...I'm going to give my all!
gacha.jp:
先生と一緒にこれから……
私、頑張ります！
gacha.zh_cn_jp:
从今往后要和老师一起……
我会努力的！
gacha.zh_cn_tw:
今后和老师一起……
我，会加油的！
gacha.zh_cn_cn:
以后就和老师一起……
我会加油的！

あはは…至らない私ですが
よろしくお願いします。

あはは…至らない私ですが

啊哈哈…虽然是有很多不足的我
不过请多多指教。

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达黑市的{cn对策委员会}一行人遇上{sn三一}综合学园的学生，{cf日步美}。{cf日步美}是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。{cn对策委员会}一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.jp: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.zh_cn: 击败小流氓的{cf日步美}和{cn对策委员会}一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的{cf日步美}，顺手将其救下。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Everyone asks why she is being chased, and Hifumi answers that it is because of the limited edition of the Peroro plush. It is at this moment that the gangsters come back, and everyone starts to engage.
desc.jp: Everyone asks why she is being chased, and Hifumi answers that it is because of the limited edition of the Peroro plush. It is at this moment that the gangsters come back, and everyone starts to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 众人询问{cf日步美}为何被追，后者回答是为了买佩洛洛大人的限定版周边。就在这时刚刚被打倒的混混又回来了，众人开始作战。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人要求{cf日步美}介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与{cf日步美}同行一段时间。另一方面，{cn便利屋68}的社长{cf亚瑠}，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.jp: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.zh_cn: 因为{cf日步美}对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.jp: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.zh_cn: {cn便利屋68}任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.jp: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.zh_cn: 任务失利加上资金耗尽，便利屋于是决定前去贷款。虽然{cf亚瑠}的账号已经因被{cn风纪委员会}通缉而被冻结，但{cf亚瑠}显然有自己的路子
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_cn: 巡视黑市的{cn对策委员会}一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.zh_cn: 走了几小时的{cn对策委员会}与{cf日步美}筋疲力尽，{cf野乃美}因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.jp: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.zh_cn: 众人发现自己的钱财似乎流入了黑市银行，而为了证实这一点，{cf白子}再次提起了自己抢银行的计划，希望藉由找到证明文件。众人顺便把{cf日步美}卷入其中。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的{cn对策委员会}学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在{cn对策委员会}一行人身后。{cf亚瑠}对{cn对策委员会}学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.jp: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.zh_cn: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，{cf亚瑠}最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，{sn阿拜多斯}一行人闯了进来。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.
desc.jp: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.
desc.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。{cf亚瑠}在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；{sn其他}成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_cn: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的{cn对策委员会}一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被{cf星野}说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被{cf亚瑠}和便利屋职员捡走。

desc.en: Defeating the guards, everyone is out.
desc.jp: Defeating the guards, everyone is out.
desc.zh_cn: 冲破黑市守卫的阻挡后，众人跑了出来。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.zh_cn: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。{cf茜香}与{cf野乃美}想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到{cf星野}的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，{cn对策委员会}一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对{sn阿拜多斯}图谋不轨。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_cn: 中间有人提出了回到{sn格黑娜}的选项，但{cf佳世子}谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有{cn风纪委员会}，尤其是{cf阳奈}的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_cn: 由于和{cn风纪委员会}的{cf亚子}交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。{cn对策委员会}决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的{cn风纪委员会}。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长{cf阳奈}现身，针对此状况责问{cf亚子}。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_cn: 老师突然将视线与{cf遥香}的对上了。{cf遥香}对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}首先为{cn风纪委员会}发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望{cn对策委员会}将{cn便利屋68}的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。{cf绫音}据理力争，而{cf亚子}则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有{et夏莱}的老师站在你们这边吧”。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.jp: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.zh_cn: 老师表示了自己对便利屋的看法，认为他们不是故意的。{cn对策委员会}的大多数也同意，但表示因为还没找到幕后黑手，所以不能轻易交给{sn格黑娜}。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_cn: 谈判破裂，{cf亚子}打算继续攻击。然而{cn对策委员会}突然受到{cf遥香}的攻击，同时{cf佳世子}也开始逐步拆穿{cf亚子}的骗局：带大量兵力来{sn其他}自治区闹事绝非{cf阳奈}所为，实际上是{cf亚子}自己出兵；目标实际上是{et夏莱}，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，{cn风纪委员会}担心{et夏莱}这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于{sn三一}的{cf日步美}将内容给了{cn茶会}，而{cn茶会}的情报又被{sn格黑娜}拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在{sn格黑娜}，顺带处理{cn便利屋68}。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.zh_cn: {cf佳世子}希望{cf亚瑠}尽快离开，但{cf亚瑠}不仅表示要战斗到底，{sn阿拜多斯}一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，{cf亚子}正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时{cf阳奈}接入通讯，{cf亚子}本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但{cf阳奈}已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往{sn格黑娜}学园和{sn三一}学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的{cf阳奈}和格黑娜{cn风纪委员会}一行人，助{sn阿拜多斯}{cn对策委员会}一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.jp: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 老师来到{sn格黑娜}，希望见到{cf阳奈}，但被{cf伊织}拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。{cf伊织}对老师破口大骂，正好遇到{cf阳奈}。{cf阳奈}见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而{cf伊织}不知为何提到了舔脚的事，{cf阳奈}大受震撼。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Hifumi reports Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designates Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.
desc.jp: Hifumi reports Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designates Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.
desc.zh_cn: {cf日步美}向{cn茶会}报告了老师的请求，{cn茶会}的{cf渚}在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派{cf日步美}带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.jp: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到{cn便利屋68}四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，{cf佳世子}对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，{cf亚瑠}表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

name.en: As Long As The People Persist
name.jp: As Long As The People Persist

desc.en: After seeing the Problem Solver off, Master Shiba suddenly realizes he forgot to say something: It takes nothing to fail, it's okay to try it again.
desc.jp: After seeing the Problem Solver off, Master Shiba suddenly realizes he forgot to say something: It takes nothing to fail, it's okay to try it again.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将走后突然意识到忘说了什么：失败也没什么，重来就好了；店铺，最重要的还是它的顾客。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The PMC HQ discovers enemies from all directions, yet the three coming from north seemed to be extraordinary.

desc.zh_cn: PMC指挥部发现了多方来袭的敌人，但北方的三人部队似乎很不对劲。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

name.en: The Prefect Team Goes To War!
name.jp: The Prefect Team Goes To War!

desc.en: As a reward of the participation, Hina made an exception and changed the punishment of writing self-criticism patters to this operation. Hina demands that no enemies should even have a slightest scratch on Sensei.
desc.jp: As a reward of the participation, Hina made an exception and changed the punishment of writing self-criticism patters to this operation. Hina demands that no enemies should even have a slightest scratch on Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: {cn风纪委员会}四人全员参战。作为此次参战的奖励，{cf阳奈}破例将原先写检讨的处分改为了此次作战。{cf阳奈}要求不能让敌人碰到老师的一分一毫。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.zh_cn: 即使如此也未曾放弃的事物（1）

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_cn: {cf日步美}与{sn三一}学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的{cn对策委员会}一行人面前。{cn对策委员会}趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达{sn阿拜多斯}高中旧本馆的{cn对策委员会}一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的{cf亚瑠}和{cn便利屋68}一行人即时出现帮助{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。{cf日步美}此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与{sn三一}毫无关联。通讯结束后，{cn对策委员会}几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.jp: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经{sn阿拜多斯}学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时{cn便利屋68}全员赶到，开始支援。{cn对策委员会}将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找{cf星野}。

desc.en: 老師、茶會和一些三一學生共同參加了對彌香的聽證會，聽證會最後決定剝奪彌香作為茶會成員所有的權力等。彌香雖被釋放，但被警告不要參加學業以外的活動。聽證會以彌香沒有異議結束。
desc.jp: 老師、茶會和一些三一學生共同參加了對彌香的聽證會，聽證會最後決定剝奪彌香作為茶會成員所有的權力等。彌香雖被釋放，但被警告不要參加學業以外的活動。聽證會以彌香沒有異議結束。
desc.zh_cn: 老师、{cn茶会}和一些{sn三一}学生共同参加了对{cf弥香}的听证会，听证会最后决定剥夺{cf弥香}作为{cn茶会}成员所有的权力等。{cf弥香}虽被释放，但被警告不要参加学业以外的活动。听证会以{cf弥香}没有异议结束。

desc.en: 梓最後揭開謎底：佩洛洛吉拉玩偶。日步美聽後興奮不已，其他人則並不太感興趣。梓表示雖然最後停產，但其中一個樣品最近就流通了出來。儘管大家都買不起，但梓和日步美還是決定去看一眼也好。
desc.jp: 梓最後揭開謎底：佩洛洛吉拉玩偶。日步美聽後興奮不已，其他人則並不太感興趣。梓表示雖然最後停產，但其中一個樣品最近就流通了出來。儘管大家都買不起，但梓和日步美還是決定去看一眼也好。
desc.zh_cn: {cf梓}最后揭开谜底：佩洛洛吉拉玩偶。{cf日步美}听后兴奋不已，{sn其他}人则并不太感兴趣。{cf梓}表示虽然最后停产，但其中一个样品最近就流通了出来。尽管大家都买不起，但{cf梓}和{cf日步美}还是决定去看一眼也好。

desc.en: 花子解釋，這次判決後，三一的形勢一下發生了變化。茶會顏面掃地不被信任、教父派的一些人企圖用空出的位子製造混亂――還有一些人純粹就是跟風。小春對彌香基本沒有惡意。梓表示，彌香幫助了奧利斯小隊，她更不可能對她有惡意。
desc.jp: 花子解釋，這次判決後，三一的形勢一下發生了變化。茶會顏面掃地不被信任、教父派的一些人企圖用空出的位子製造混亂――還有一些人純粹就是跟風。小春對彌香基本沒有惡意。梓表示，彌香幫助了奧利斯小隊，她更不可能對她有惡意。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}解释，这次判决后，{sn三一}的形势一下发生了变化。{cn茶会}颜面扫地不被信任、教父派的一些人企图用空出的位子制造混乱――还有一些人纯粹就是跟风。{cf小春}对{cf弥香}基本没有恶意。{cf梓}表示，{cf弥香}帮助了{cn奥利斯小队}，她更不可能对她有恶意。

name.en: 被捲入紛爭的放學後的甜點部
name.jp: 被捲入紛爭的放學後的甜點部
name.zh_cn: 被卷入纷争的{cn放学后的甜点部}

desc.en: 放學後的甜點部正好經過這裡，遇到了不滿判決結果的學生們。本來放學後的甜點部是為了來吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，結果並沒有看到。眾人詢問不滿的學生們，後者不但沒回答還試圖將他們捲入其中。
desc.jp: 放學後的甜點部正好經過這裡，遇到了不滿判決結果的學生們。本來放學後的甜點部是為了來吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，結果並沒有看到。眾人詢問不滿的學生們，後者不但沒回答還試圖將他們捲入其中。
desc.zh_cn: {cn放学后的甜点部}正好经过这里，遇到了不满判决结果的学生们。本来{cn放学后的甜点部}是为了来吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，结果并没有看到。众人询问不满的学生们，后者不但没回答还试图将他们卷入其中。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

「普通に」スイーツを食べること

desc.en: 眾人討論了一會彌香的事，之後回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威學生詢問是否看到冰激凌車，而後者表示因為會妨礙他們，所以把它趕走了。愛莉追問冰激凌車的下落，沒想到遭到示威學生的不悅，將其推開。
desc.jp: 眾人討論了一會彌香的事，之後回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威學生詢問是否看到冰激凌車，而後者表示因為會妨礙他們，所以把它趕走了。愛莉追問冰激凌車的下落，沒想到遭到示威學生的不悅，將其推開。
desc.zh_cn: 众人讨论了一会{cf弥香}的事，之后回到原本的冰激凌上。{cf夏}向示威学生询问是否看到冰激凌车，而后者表示因为会妨碍他们，所以把它赶走了。{cf爱莉}追问冰激凌车的下落，没想到遭到示威学生的不悦，将其推开。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.jp: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.zh_cn: {cf沙织}的加入让聚集在一起的{cn奥利斯小队}也回应了老师的召集。{cn修女会}和{cn救护骑士团}在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来{cn温泉开发部}和被释放的{cf小雪}伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向{cn忍术研究部}转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。

desc.en: 奧利斯小隊也收到了老師的訊息，但日和擔心他們處於通緝狀態，這樣會給老師帶來麻煩。就在這時眾人聽到一陣奇怪的聲音。
desc.jp: 奧利斯小隊也收到了老師的訊息，但日和擔心他們處於通緝狀態，這樣會給老師帶來麻煩。就在這時眾人聽到一陣奇怪的聲音。
desc.zh_cn: {cn奥利斯小队}也收到了老师的消息，但{cf日和}担心他们处于通缉状态，这样会给老师带来麻烦。就在这时众人听到一阵奇怪的声音。

desc.zh_cn: 众人发现一个奇怪的头盔圈正在向他们靠近。未等确认身份，{cf美咲}就开了枪。奇怪的头盔圈忙脱下帽子，原来是{cf沙织}。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}回报称，由于霍德钻进了堡垒都市地下，而那里被{cf莉音}的系统保护着，无法探测；他们正在破译密码，但耗时会比较长。{cf真纪}听后有点惊讶，但{cf乃爱}让{cf真纪}继续专注于第一圣所。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.jp: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}突然接入通讯，表示她记得曾经有人伪造过{sn千年}的债券，而相关的系统就是由{cf莉音}设计。{cf千寻}以为是{cf阳葵}所作，但后者表示另有其人。{cf乃爱}听后呼叫了{cf优香}，而{cf优香}让{cf乃爱}来一趟反省室。

desc.en: 工程師部對柱子的攻略方法是：在其周圍挖洞，使其失去支撐而倒塌。雖然說也有其他的方案，但規模實在過大，他們到了極限。就在這時有人前來拜訪。
desc.jp: 工程師部對柱子的攻略方法是：在其周圍挖洞，使其失去支撐而倒塌。雖然說也有其他的方案，但規模實在過大，他們到了極限。就在這時有人前來拜訪。
desc.zh_cn: {cn工程师部}对柱子的攻略方法是：在其周围挖洞，使其失去支撑而倒塌。虽然说也有{sn其他}的方案，但规模实在过大，他们到了极限。就在这时有人前来拜访。

desc.en: 優香和乃愛打開了反省室的門，把小雪弄了出來。小雪以為兩人要把她另外帶走教育，不過兩人則表示並不是為了繼續追究上次的事。優香指出他們需要小雪的計算能力。
desc.jp: 優香和乃愛打開了反省室的門，把小雪弄了出來。小雪以為兩人要把她另外帶走教育，不過兩人則表示並不是為了繼續追究上次的事。優香指出他們需要小雪的計算能力。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}和{cf乃爱}打开了反省室的门，把{cf小雪}弄了出来。{cf小雪}以为两人要把她另外带走教育，不过两人则表示并不是为了继续追究上次的事。{cf优香}指出他们需要{cf小雪}的计算能力。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 供給部的風華和茱莉分別負責煮飯和食物的分發。風華提到這樣下去食材很可能不夠，這時他們聽到了車聲。
desc.jp: 供給部的風華和茱莉分別負責煮飯和食物的分發。風華提到這樣下去食材很可能不夠，這時他們聽到了車聲。
desc.zh_cn: {cn供给部}的{cf风华}和{cf茱莉}分别负责煮饭和食物的分发。{cf风华}提到这样下去食材很可能不够，这时他们听到了车声。

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 補課部的梓和日步美被安排到了在第六聖所周邊執行巡邏的任務。梓對保護日步美一事很有信心。日步美與梓約定，在戰鬥結束後，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特攝電影。
desc.jp: 補課部的梓和日步美被安排到了在第六聖所周邊執行巡邏的任務。梓對保護日步美一事很有信心。日步美與梓約定，在戰鬥結束後，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特攝電影。
desc.zh_cn: {cn补课部}的{cf梓}和{cf日步美}被安排到了在第六圣所周边执行巡逻的任务。{cf梓}对保护{cf日步美}一事很有信心。{cf日步美}与{cf梓}约定，在战斗结束后，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特摄电影。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: 凱坦澤在任務結束後匆匆離開。眾人聽了他們自誇的言論後，更加迷惑他們是誰了。
desc.jp: 凱坦澤在任務結束後匆匆離開。眾人聽了他們自誇的言論後，更加迷惑他們是誰了。
desc.zh_cn: 凯坦泽在任务结束后匆匆离开。众人听了他们自夸的言论后，更加迷惑他们是谁了。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Kaitenger is a bunch of students claiming themselves as the "superheros of justice", but in fact they cause trouble most of the time. They're the main bosses in the game.
desc.jp: Kaitenger is a bunch of students claiming themselves as the "superheros of justice", but in fact they cause trouble most of the time. They're the main bosses in the game.
desc.zh_cn: Kaitenger是一群自称为“正义的英雄”的学生，实际上常常闹出卵子。她们也是游戏中的主BOSS。

hobby.en: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
hobby.jp: ペロログッズ集め、可愛いもの集め、ショッピング、相談に乗ること
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 收集佩洛洛周边、收集可爱的物品、购物、与人相谈

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.jp: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.zh_cn: 由于有了{cf季}的支援，{cn特异现象搜查部}两人的工作得以减少一部分。不过{cf阳葵}警告{cf季}说，{cf季}的装甲的力量在很大程度上与{cf莉音}的要塞都市有关，而在都市被摧毁的情况下，建议{cf季}只把它当作普通装甲看待。

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: 搭乘生命守護者主艦的學生、以及留在陸地上的學生一起共度最後的晚上，為了迎接美好的未來而做好覺悟。
desc.jp: 搭乘生命守護者主艦的學生、以及留在陸地上的學生一起共度最後的晚上，為了迎接美好的未來而做好覺悟。
desc.zh_cn: 搭乘生命守护者主舰的学生、以及留在陆地上的学生一起共度最后的晚上，为了迎接美好的{cf未来}而做好觉悟。

desc.en: 優香與乃愛連線，希望他們能夠保護好千年。乃愛請優香放心，並讓她也注意自己。
desc.jp: 優香與乃愛連線，希望他們能夠保護好千年。乃愛請優香放心，並讓她也注意自己。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}与{cf乃爱}连线，希望他们能够保护好{sn千年}。{cf乃爱}请{cf优香}放心，并让她也注意自己。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子
举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 對策委員會其他人聽到綾音要走堅決不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果會發生戰鬥，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他們要親手帶回白子。綾音提醒眾人這個計劃並不是百分百成功，就在這時一陣聲音打斷了綾音。
desc.jp: 對策委員會其他人聽到綾音要走堅決不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果會發生戰鬥，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他們要親手帶回白子。綾音提醒眾人這個計劃並不是百分百成功，就在這時一陣聲音打斷了綾音。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}{sn其他}人听到{cf绫音}要走坚决不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果会发生战斗，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他们要亲手带回{cf白子}。{cf绫音}提醒众人这个计划并不是百分百成功，就在这时一阵声音打断了{cf绫音}。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 便利屋全員來拜訪對策委員會眾人。亞瑠指出，這種時刻更不應該向後看，而應向前看。便利屋表示只要有老師在，一切一定都會成功。對策委員會回想起以前的種種，堅定了信心。
desc.jp: 便利屋全員來拜訪對策委員會眾人。亞瑠指出，這種時刻更不應該向後看，而應向前看。便利屋表示只要有老師在，一切一定都會成功。對策委員會回想起以前的種種，堅定了信心。
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋全员来拜访{cn对策委员会}众人。{cf亚瑠}指出，这种时刻更不应该向后看，而应向前看。便利屋表示只要有老师在，一切一定都会成功。{cn对策委员会}回想起以前的种种，坚定了信心。

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.jp: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，阿拜多斯高中的主题曲。常用于阿拜多斯高中成员出现且情况转好时。一个比较著名的使用例是大家在计划救出星野的时候。

desc.en: 遊戲開發部對生命守護者並非真正意義上的戰艦而感到失望，同時也因為計劃的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。愛麗絲堅決要去，她認為自己是船上唯一攜帶著武器的人，她想保護大家，為大家作出些貢獻。柚子對愛麗絲的想法表示贊同，說明她不想再讓大家分開――況且，還有老師在呢。柚子說正是因為愛麗絲才讓她走到了今天這一步，提議大家還是一起去最好；桃井和綠最後接受。
desc.jp: 遊戲開發部對生命守護者並非真正意義上的戰艦而感到失望，同時也因為計劃的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。愛麗絲堅決要去，她認為自己是船上唯一攜帶著武器的人，她想保護大家，為大家作出些貢獻。柚子對愛麗絲的想法表示贊同，說明她不想再讓大家分開――況且，還有老師在呢。柚子說正是因為愛麗絲才讓她走到了今天這一步，提議大家還是一起去最好；桃井和綠最後接受。
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}对生命守护者并非真正意义上的战舰而感到失望，同时也因为计划的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。{cf爱丽丝}坚决要去，她认为自己是船上唯一携带着武器的人，她想保护大家，为大家作出些贡献。{cf柚子}对{cf爱丽丝}的想法表示赞同，说明她不想再让大家分开――况且，还有老师在呢。{cf柚子}说正是因为{cf爱丽丝}才让她走到了今天这一步，提议大家还是一起去最好；{cf桃井}和{cf绿}最后接受。

desc.en: 愛麗絲說自己也曾害怕過，因為Kei仍在愛麗絲的資料中。愛麗絲提起老師跟她談論“自己選擇成為什麼”的事情，表示自己這次想要成為勇者。所有人支援愛麗絲的話，表示愛麗絲要成為“宇宙勇者”了。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲說自己也曾害怕過，因為Kei仍在愛麗絲的資料中。愛麗絲提起老師跟她談論“自己選擇成為什麼”的事情，表示自己這次想要成為勇者。所有人支援愛麗絲的話，表示愛麗絲要成為“宇宙勇者”了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}说自己也曾害怕过，因为Kei仍在{cf爱丽丝}的数据中。{cf爱丽丝}提起老师跟她谈论“自己选择成为什么”的事情，表示自己这次想要成为勇者。所有人支持{cf爱丽丝}的话，表示{cf爱丽丝}要成为“宇宙勇者”了。

desc.en: 花子來到補課部所在的教室，向各位告別。花子談起他們與老師以前發生的種種事情，似問非問地提出“要是老師不在會怎麼樣。”眾人隨後請花子放心，表示他們會守護好三一的。
desc.jp: 花子來到補課部所在的教室，向各位告別。花子談起他們與老師以前發生的種種事情，似問非問地提出“要是老師不在會怎麼樣。”眾人隨後請花子放心，表示他們會守護好三一的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}来到{cn补课部}所在的教室，向各位告别。{cf花子}谈起他们与老师以前发生的种种事情，似问非问地提出“要是老师不在会怎么样。”众人随后请{cf花子}放心，表示他们会守护好{sn三一}的。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 對策委員會在柴大將的店裡吃拉麵，茜香有些難堪。談到價錢，老闆主動表示這一頓免費，並讓茜香先歇一會。星野故意重提許久以前的“坐白子還是野乃美旁邊”這一問題，而惱火的茜香直接坐到了星野大腿上。星野隨後被眾人擠著。
desc.jp: 對策委員會在柴大將的店裡吃拉麵，茜香有些難堪。談到價錢，老闆主動表示這一頓免費，並讓茜香先歇一會。星野故意重提許久以前的“坐白子還是野乃美旁邊”這一問題，而惱火的茜香直接坐到了星野大腿上。星野隨後被眾人擠著。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}在柴大将的店里吃拉面，{cf茜香}有些难堪。谈到价钱，老板主动表示这一顿免费，并让{cf茜香}先歇一会。{cf星野}故意重提许久以前的“坐{cf白子}还是{cf野乃美}旁边”这一问题，而恼火的{cf茜香}直接坐到了{cf星野}大腿上。{cf星野}随后被众人挤着。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: 彩奈歡迎星奈入住自己的箱子，星奈表示了感謝。雖然作為後輩，彩奈還是讓星奈說出了那句“我回來了”的臺詞。
desc.jp: 彩奈歡迎星奈入住自己的箱子，星奈表示了感謝。雖然作為後輩，彩奈還是讓星奈說出了那句“我回來了”的臺詞。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}欢迎星奈入住自己的箱子，星奈表示了感谢。虽然作为后辈，{cf彩奈}还是让星奈说出了那句“我回来了”的台词。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: 琳向步和桃香表示感謝，感謝他們信任並願意跟隨著她。步提及了琳被撤職一事，而琳則表示這事還是不要步插手好一些。在走之前，步提到在琳的桌面上似乎有一封給她的信。
desc.jp: 琳向步和桃香表示感謝，感謝他們信任並願意跟隨著她。步提及了琳被撤職一事，而琳則表示這事還是不要步插手好一些。在走之前，步提到在琳的桌面上似乎有一封給她的信。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}向{cf步}和{cf桃香}表示感谢，感谢他们信任并愿意跟随着她。{cf步}提及了{cf琳}被撤职一事，而{cf琳}则表示这事还是不要{cf步}插手好一些。在走之前，{cf步}提到在{cf琳}的桌面上似乎有一封给她的信。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 百鬼夜行的陰陽部部長仁也聯絡上了老師，詢問老師近況如何，並追問了有關老師全身赤裸在田野上奔跑一事，老師不予置評。回到正題，仁也提到忍術研究部的各位已經回去，見到了自稱為百花繚亂的副部長。她提到他們帶回了一封據稱是來自部長葛葉的信，要專門給老師看。
desc.jp: 百鬼夜行的陰陽部部長仁也聯絡上了老師，詢問老師近況如何，並追問了有關老師全身赤裸在田野上奔跑一事，老師不予置評。回到正題，仁也提到忍術研究部的各位已經回去，見到了自稱為百花繚亂的副部長。她提到他們帶回了一封據稱是來自部長葛葉的信，要專門給老師看。
desc.zh_cn: {sn百鬼夜行}的{cn阴阳部}部长仁也联系上了老师，询问老师近况如何，并追问了有关老师全身赤裸在田野上奔跑一事，老师不予置评。回到正题，仁也提到{cn忍术研究部}的各位已经回去，见到了自称为百花缭乱的副部长。她提到他们带回了一封据称是来自部长{cf葛业}的信，要专门给老师看。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Niya is a student of Yin-Yang Club.
desc.jp: Niya is a student of Yin-Yang Club.
desc.zh_cn: 仁耶是阴阳部的一名成员。

desc.en: 葛葉在信件中提到，被色彩侵蝕之人是無法逆轉回去的。如果要了解更多的話，就去百鬼夜行區親自見見她。
desc.jp: 葛葉在信件中提到，被色彩侵蝕之人是無法逆轉回去的。如果要了解更多的話，就去百鬼夜行區親自見見她。
desc.zh_cn: {cf葛业}在信件中提到，被色彩侵蚀之人是无法逆转回去的。如果要了解更多的话，就去{sn百鬼夜行}区亲自见见她。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.jp: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.zh_cn: 葛业是来自百花缭乱冲突解决委员会的一名先知，其能力与圣亚类似。在终篇中，葛业帮助圣亚剥夺了后者的能力，以便使其在接下来发生的事件中保持安全。她给老师留下了一条消息，其中声称没有能将色彩侵蚀之人复原的方法，并邀请老师当面与她聊聊。

desc.en: 琳回到自己的辦公室，見到了桌面上的信件。信上沒有寫寄出人，但琳根據信的筆跡認出，這似乎是一封來自聯邦學生會會長的信。
desc.jp: 琳回到自己的辦公室，見到了桌面上的信件。信上沒有寫寄出人，但琳根據信的筆跡認出，這似乎是一封來自聯邦學生會會長的信。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}回到自己的办公室，见到了桌面上的信件。信上没有写寄出人，但{cf琳}根据信的笔迹认出，这似乎是一封来自联邦学生会会长的信。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 最終，彩奈與星奈在箱子的教室裡會合。星奈坐在一張課桌前，而彩奈則在一邊看著她。本篇故事以此次會合結束。在單擊此頁面後，遊戲將會重啟到主選單，允許玩家重新登入時觀看新的載入動畫。【注意：這是每個賬號都只有一次的機會，重新播放故事並不會觸發這一行為。】
desc.jp: 最終，彩奈與星奈在箱子的教室裡會合。星奈坐在一張課桌前，而彩奈則在一邊看著她。本篇故事以此次會合結束。在單擊此頁面後，遊戲將會重啟到主選單，允許玩家重新登入時觀看新的載入動畫。【注意：這是每個賬號都只有一次的機會，重新播放故事並不會觸發這一行為。】
desc.zh_cn: 最终，{cf彩奈}与星奈在箱子的教室里会合。星奈坐在一张课桌前，而{cf彩奈}则在一边看着她。本篇故事以此次会合结束。在单击此页面后，游戏将会重启到主菜单，允许玩家重新登录时观看新的加载动画。【注意：这是每个账号都只有一次的机会，重新播放故事并不会触发这一行为。】

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en:
為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。
為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！
desc.jp:
為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。
為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！

为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en: 開始堆沙堡的一行人。與想要堆一個簡單沙堡的日步美想法不同，麻白與梓蓋了一個巨大的城堡，之後便與太妹開始了攻城戰。
desc.jp: 開始堆沙堡的一行人。與想要堆一個簡單沙堡的日步美想法不同，麻白與梓蓋了一個巨大的城堡，之後便與太妹開始了攻城戰。
desc.zh_cn: 开始堆沙堡的一行人。与想要堆一个简单沙堡的{cf日步美}想法不同，{cf麻白}与{cf梓}盖了一个巨大的城堡，之后便与太妹开始了攻城战。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！
desc.jp:
為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。
為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en:
為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。

為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。
為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en: 雖然抵達海之家，代替主人的卻是泉。因為泉而受傷的太妹們已經開始進行報復了。
desc.jp: 雖然抵達海之家，代替主人的卻是泉。因為泉而受傷的太妹們已經開始進行報復了。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然抵达海之家，代替主人的却是{cf泉}。因为{cf泉}而受伤的太妹们已经开始进行报复了。

hobby.en: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
hobby.jp: ペロログッズ集め、可愛いもの集め、ショッピング、相談に乗ること

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 收集佩洛洛周边玩具、购物、做倾听者

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 制作古怪食物、吃古怪食物

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 电影鉴赏、阅读（恋爱小说）
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 电影鉴赏、读书（恋爱小说）

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 因為接連而來的突發狀況而感到疲憊的日步美呈現自暴自棄的狀態。然後如日步美所預想，太妹們又再次攻了進來。

desc.zh_cn: 因为接连而来的突发状况而感到疲惫的{cf日步美}呈现自暴自弃的状态。然后如{cf日步美}所预想，太妹们又再次攻了进来。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。
為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！
desc.jp:
為了達成各自的目的而前往海邊的學生們。
為了達成許願清單的少女們，開始孤軍奮戰！
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en: 晚間時刻，正在準備放煙火的一行人。煙火就要開始了，但是太妹們丟了一個鞭炮過來，瞬間將場地轉為戰場。
desc.jp: 晚間時刻，正在準備放煙火的一行人。煙火就要開始了，但是太妹們丟了一個鞭炮過來，瞬間將場地轉為戰場。
desc.zh_cn: 晚间时刻，正在准备放烟火的一行人。烟火就要开始了，但是太妹们丢了一个鞭炮过来，瞬间将场地转为战场。

desc.en: 射西瓜對決的風暴平息以後，日步美才對沒有發生任何意外感到安心。卻因為泉問了是誰贏，再度燃起麻白與梓之間的自尊心爭鬥。
desc.jp: 射西瓜對決的風暴平息以後，日步美才對沒有發生任何意外感到安心。卻因為泉問了是誰贏，再度燃起麻白與梓之間的自尊心爭鬥。
desc.zh_cn: 射西瓜对决的风暴平息以后，{cf日步美}才对没有发生任何意外感到安心。却因为{cf泉}问了是谁赢，再度燃起{cf麻白}与{cf梓}之间的自尊心争斗。

desc.en: 憂的請求是，不要向外人公開紀念時光膠囊的存在，並把地圖和卷軸一起保留下來。花子和老師只交給櫻子調查結果的一部分。所有事情結束後，憂表示自己要親切以待的人變多了，流露出複雜又微妙的情緒。
desc.jp: 憂的請求是，不要向外人公開紀念時光膠囊的存在，並把地圖和卷軸一起保留下來。花子和老師只交給櫻子調查結果的一部分。所有事情結束後，憂表示自己要親切以待的人變多了，流露出複雜又微妙的情緒。
desc.zh_cn: {cf忧}的请求是，不要向外人公开纪念时光胶囊的存在，并把地图和卷轴一起保留下来。{cf花子}和老师只交给{cf樱子}调查结果的一部分。所有事情结束后，{cf忧}表示自己要亲切以待的人变多了，流露出复杂又微妙的情绪。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.jp: 五個聖所全都消滅了，但能量全都集中在第6個聖所。在「最後聖所」進行決戰，現在命運全都取決於陽葵拿出的祕密武器。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
